description: A React-like component written in TSX for a Qwik application, implementing a counter with buttons to increment and decrement the count, and displaying a gauge component.

methods.name: Counter component$
methods.description: Defines a Qwik component that manages a count state with increment and decrement buttons and a gauge display.

methods.name: setCount
methods.description: Updates the count value within valid bounds (0-100).
